price: I govore: “Gospodaru naš, požuri, kazni nas, prije Dana u kojem će se račun polagati!”
arabic: وَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبۡلَ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqālū rabbanā ʿajjil lanā qiṭṭanā qabla yawmi al-ḥisābi
